version = '1.0' buildscript { repositories { mavenCentral() jcenter() } dependencies { //gertty jar包 classpath "org.akhikhl.gretty:gretty:1.2.4" } } //指定编码 repositories { mavenCentral() jcenter() } [compileJava, compileTestJava, javadoc]*.options*.encoding = "UTF-8" dependencies { // testCompile group: 'junit', name: 'junit', version: '4.11' compile 'commons-logging:commons-logging:1.2' compile 'jstl:jstl:1.2' //compile 'log4j:log4j:1.2.17' //log //compile 'org.slf4j:slf4j-log4j12:1.7.12' compile "ch.qos.logback:logback-classic:1.1.3" compile "org.slf4j:jcl-over-slf4j:1.7.12" //compile "org.slf4j:log4j-over-slf4j:1.7.12" //compile 'log4j:log4j:1.2.17' //防止日志文件冲突报错 configurations.all { resolutionStrategy.eachDependency { DependencyResolveDetails details -> if (details.requested.name == 'log4j') { details.useTarget 'log4j:log4j:1.2.+' } } } // if (details.requested.name == 'commons-logging') { // details.useTarget "org.slf4j:jcl-over-slf4j:1.7.5" // } //compile 'log4j:log4j:1.2.17' //c3p0数据源 compile 'c3p0:c3p0:0.9.1.2' //mysql驱动 compile 'mysql:mysql-connector-java:5.1.18' // the database libraries. postgresql // compile "com.alibaba:druid:1.0.14" // compile "org.postgresql:postgresql:9.4-1201-jdbc41" // compile 'org.postgis:postgis-jdbc:1.3.3' //freemarker jar compile 'org.freemarker:freemarker:2.3.23' //spring jar compile 'org.springframework:spring-beans:4.2.1.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework:spring-context:4.2.1.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework:spring-core:4.2.1.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework:spring-expression:4.2.1.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework:spring-jdbc:4.2.1.RELEASE'//应该是springjdbc数据源 compile 'org.springframework:spring-tx:4.2.1.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework:spring-web:4.2.1.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework:spring-webmvc:4.2.1.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework:spring-webmvc-portlet:4.2.1.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework:spring-context-support:4.2.1.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework.data:spring-data-commons:1.11.0.RELEASE' compile 'org.springframework.security:spring-security-core:4.0.2.RELEASE' compile 'com.google.guava:guava:18.0' compile 'org.apache.commons:commons-lang3:3.4' compile 'commons-beanutils:commons-beanutils:1.9.2' // the Cache libraries. compile "redis.clients:jedis:2.6.3" compile "org.springframework.data:spring-data-commons:1.10.2.RELEASE" compile "org.springframework.data:spring-data-redis:1.5.2.RELEASE" compile "org.apache.commons:commons-pool2:2.4.2" compile "org.springframework.session:spring-session:1.0.2.RELEASE" compile("org.springframework.session:spring-session-data-redis:1.0.2.RELEASE") { transitive = false } // test libraries compile "org.uncommons:reportng:1.1.4" compile("junit:junit:4.12") { exclude group: 'org.hamcrest' } compile "org.testng:testng:6.9.4" compile "org.hamcrest:hamcrest-all:1.3" compile "org.mockito:mockito-core:1.10.19" compile "com.jayway.jsonpath:json-path:2.0.0" compile "com.google.inject:guice:4.0" compile "org.dbunit:dbunit:2.5.1" compile("com.github.springtestdbunit:spring-test-dbunit:1.2.1") { transitive = false; } compile "com.jayway.awaitility:awaitility:1.6.3" compile 'org.springframework:spring-test:4.2.1.RELEASE' //DateTime compile 'joda-time:joda-time:2.8.2' // compile 'com.github.springtestdbunit:spring-test-dbunit:1.2.1' // compile 'org.testng:testng:6.9.6' compile 'com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-annotations:2.6.1' compile 'com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-core:2.4.1' compile 'com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind:2.5.3' compile 'taglibs:standard:1.1.2' //apache providedCompile 'javax.servlet:servlet-api:2.5' } //应用gertty jar包 apply plugin: 'org.akhikhl.gretty' ` win+R 启动项目用 找到项目的硬盘目录下面 用命令行方式 gradle appRun即可 调试项目，需要在idea里面配置remote，然后找到项目的硬盘目录下面 用命令的方式 gradle appRunDebug 即可
